name: Gravitrix (dureovalar)
description:
Gravitrix is a game in which the player must place the pieces that appear in order to align and that these disappear. Sound familiar? What if we add gravity, friction and weight? That's Gravitrix. It shows how far you can get.

Two different and challenging play modes.

Use your keyboard or Xbox Pad to play. (Pad is recommended :P )

RELEASE VERSION:

  • Faster turn of pieces.
  • Ranking added.

PREVIOUS UPDATE:

  • New mode: No Walls
  • Improved controls.
  • Improved graphics.
  • Linux version.
Any comments to improve the game are welcome.
